_gram:
({#staMBate#}, 
{#staBnoti, staBnAti, stAMBita#} or {#stabDaH#}; the {#s#} of
the root being changed to {#z#} after
prepositions ending in {#i#} or {#u#} and
also after {#ava#})
_meanings:
{@--2@} To make firm
or stiff, to make immoveable.

{@--5@} To become stiff,
rigid or immoveable.

{@--6@} To be
proud or elated, be stiff-necked.
(The following verse illustrates the
root in its different conjugations:
--{#staMBate puruzaH prAyo yOvanena Danane ca . na#} 
{#staBnAti kzitISo'pi na staBnoti yuvApyasO ..#}).
